name: PumpKin Majo
description:
Our game is an 2D endless platform game.
Your only goal is to get as high as you can and earn the highest score.

Our pumpkin witch tries to avoid hitting the evil pumpkins and stay away from other enemies while collecting green orbs and trying to reach the highest score on halloween. So it takes a lot of effort to make the highest score on halloween.

If you hit enemy creatures, they can explode and hurt you.
When your health reaches zero, it's game over.

Can you make our pumpkin witch with this cute and colorful drawings get the highest score with a pleasant background music?

Rise in the Leaderboards!
And don't look down!
